code: import{useToast}from"@chakra-ui/react";import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useIntl}from"react-intl";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";export default function Toast(){var toast=useToast();var toastData=useSelector(function(state){return state.general.toastData;});var intl=useIntl();useEffect(function(){if(toastData){var title=toastData.title,description=toastData.description,status=toastData.status;toast({title:typeof title==='string'||title instanceof String?intl.formatMessage({id:title,defaultMessage:title}):title,description:description.toString(),status:status,duration:9000,isClosable:true});}},[toastData,toast]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null);}
